import React from 'react' export default function Project({ projectName, desc, tools, images, link }) { const splashImage = images[0]; const openLink = () => { window.open(link, '_blank') } return (

{projectName}

{tools.join(", ")}
{images.map((image) => { return ( jsx-a11y/anchor-has-content warning ) })}
) }
